item.title: lower gastrointestinal bleeding
item.description: [!info] 🌱 來自: [[gastrointestinal bleeding]] lower gastrointestinal bleeding (NEJM 2017;376:1054) 詳見 Acute Lower Gastrointestinal Bleeding. [[diverticular bleed]] (30%) Polyp/Tumor (20%) Typically slow ooze, p/w fatigue, weight loss, iron deficiency, anemia [[Colitis]] (20%) Infectious (see “Acute Diarrhea”), IBD, ischemic colitis, XRT Anorectal disorders (20%) Internal, external hemorrhoids anal fissures, rectal ulcers, rectal varices (Rx by ↓ portal venous pressure in cirrhosis), XRT Vascular (<10%) Angioectasia & AVMs.
